summary:
this add the best thing ever in skyforge 
it finaly add a workbensh to improve armors its the missing think in skyforge and also it add some little improvement and also a ysgramor statue in skyforge
descriptionHtml:
hi everyone im [COLOR=#8064a2][SIZE=5]skull19972[/SIZE][/COLOR]
 and this is my second mod
as you know i hate retex so this is not a retex so don\'t worry
also it dont interface any of the companion scenes

Please endrose  If you would like to give any kind of feedback on this mod, please use the website\'s \'Comments, Endorsement and Ratings!!! ;)

[SIZE=4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oLDiWeQVxeg&feature=youtu.be
[/SIZE]watch this video too !! i create this video to explain my two mods !!!

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23727-3-1347045848.jpg[/img]


[COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=6]DESCRIPTION :
[/SIZE][/COLOR]
As their is Talos statue in whiterun now you will see ysgramor statue of course the companion must have a ysgramor statue see pic 

 people of skyrim aren\\\'t you tired from using the skyforge without a workbensh and without a smelter??? 
people of skyrim aren\\\'t you tired from going to skyforge and when you finish you go to adrian in her forge to improve your armours ??? 
people of skyrim aren\\\'t you tired from the lie that skyforge is legendary ??? how it can be legendary without a workbensh and a smelter???
WELL actualy if you are not tired from that
well i\\\'am tired realy verry tired so i did create BETTER SKYFORGE and i though that you will need it
so skyrim\'s people im your freind skull19972 and finaly i did create a workbensh and a smelter in skyforge finaly !!!! lool
also do you see the big Bird statue you must enter in one of his 2 entry to see what forge did i add its so cool see pictures
also i did add a big statue of ysgramor in the entry of the big bird you must see it and to succed entreing there u must use CTRL i mean sneak mod or you must use that cheat TCL
because the companions must have a ysgramor statue is their legendary hero
see pictures
